WRITING.TEXT: I prefer fantasy books but I'll try to get around to checking out anything you show me!
Thanks! I hope I do too, cause I need another series I haven't read 7 times to keep re-reading!

I think I actually own the whole WoT series, but I haven't gotten around to starting it yet. This is also why I asked this question. I wanted to hear others thoughts on books because I basically just re-read all the books I know and love. Stormlight archives is another I haven't heard of until now but it's now on my list of books to check out (after I finish with the current series I am reading of course)

Yes, if you just google MapleStory, it should be one of the first links. It's a free to play game but it's honestly more pay to win. Although you don't need to pay to have fun with it. It looks very childish, I think anyways, but I found it to be quite a fun game with A LOT to do in it. Hit me up if you decide to play it and I could probably help you out a bit in it.
Awesome! I can't wait until I read it. Seems like I'll be reading a lot of new stuff now instead of re-reading everything I know I love.
That definitely sounds like something I would enjoy! I have a bunch of book series on the go that are still in progress so that's not a big deal.

Never watched the show, and I tried reading them a while ago. Read the first few chapters of the first book but it didn't really catch me like a lot of other books have. Were you hooked right away or did it take a bit?
MapleStory. It's a 2d side scrolling MMORPG. I used to play it so much (been playing almost since its release 12 years ago (I think)). Now I usually only play it when I'm really stoned.
So glad I asked this question, another I haven't heard of. Is it just one book, or a series?
That's the game of thrones series, correct?
Yeah that was an extremely good one. That's 2 for the Inheritance Cycle so I definitely need to read it again.
Haven't heard of that one either, but that means I just need to check it out. Whose the author?
Too fricken true! I loved the books more than the movies but I thought they did a pretty good job with the movies.
Never heard of it but I'm definitely going to check it out! How many books are in the series?
Absolutely loved that series! Only read it once though so it may me time for another go.
Eldest as in the Eragon series or just that one book, or something completely different? I've read HP more than I can count.

WRITING.TITLE: What is a good fantasy book/series to read?

WRITING.TEXT: I may be more in to TV shows but it's still not much of a list. Lately I've been into The Magicians (based off a book that I thoroughly enjoyed), anything Superhero-y (The Flash, Arrow, Daredevil, Jessica Jones type stuff), Other popular shows like How I met your mother, Doctor who, Big Bang Theory. Actually one of my favorite tv shows is Cheers (Old but good). I would list more but the hard drive I had them all downloaded on to is lost and it's getting hard to think of any besides the ones of watched most recently.

I don't mind spending up to 500 or so on a good pair of headphones and the pxc 550's have some features that I find quite awesome. (Pause on taking off, swipe gestures on side, shut off/turn on when folding/unfolding). They are the limit to what I would spend though.
Me too, but I'm also not an avid movie watcher. I'm more into TV shows.
